text: I start playing when we come came to
Denmark in 2000 started in a refugee
camp suddenly there was no war and you
have a safe place to sleep and it could
be a kid
when I was in the Afghan military and
when the Taliban gained power in the
country they killed him so my mom made
the decision that we had to leave the

I got a second chance I want to give

and that gives them the chance to dream
